aka: The Legend of Zainab and Noah
The Legend of Zeineb and Noah

director.name: 尤斯利·纳斯尔拉 Yousry Nasrallah

trans_title: The Legend of Zainab and Noah
The Legend of Zeineb and Noah
introduction: Zeineb, who despite her young age is already engaged to an older man, escapes from her village in Upper Egypt with Noah, her 16-year-old Christian neighbor, embarking on a road trip in which they both confront many of the myths and fears they believed were true.
